snippet.title: Inkulinati - Academy Invite Trailer
snippet.description:
☛  Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/957960/Inkulinati/

You've been invited to the prestigious & world-renowned (but super secret!) Inkulinati Academy!📩

Inkulinati is coming to Early Access on Steam, GoG, Xbox Game Preview for Xbox One & Xbox Series S | X & Xbox Game Pass this winter! Nintendo Switch is coming once Inkulinati's Early Access phase is done.

------------------------------

CREDITS

Script:
Yaza Games
 
Animation & Edit:
YELLOW TAPIR FILMS
Marcin Podolec 
Agata Mianowska 
Kacper Zamarło 
Konrad Sierzputowski
 
Voice Over:
Hildegard von Blingin'

Music:
Aleksander Zabłocki

------------------------------

Inkulinati is an ink-based strategy straight from medieval manuscripts, where a rabbit’s bum can be deadlier than a dog's sword! 

Become a master of the Living Ink, build your own bestiary, defeat medieval superstars and collect perks to unleash hidden powers.

☛  Twitter: https://twitter.com/yazagames 
☛  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/inkulinati
☛  Website: http://www.yazagames.com
☛  GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/inkulinati
